name: Big girl
content: The corner of this place
Dust on the window
Hanging around with no words to say
Smoke on the water
Fuzzes up all the things you faked
I wanna get outof this situation
I wanna wipe out the memories you gave
No one takes control
The style of my life you cannot change
Oooh..Big Girl
Why do you always cry
Forget the pain and find your way
Oooh..Big Girl
Why do you waste your time
Raise your head to play this game
